div.font:
挖矿防止
女巫攻击

switch.text: 挖矿防止 女巫攻击

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

font.font:
点对点网络。
各个节点的操作权限对等

switch.text: 对称网络点对点网络。各个节点的操作权限对等...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 231px; height: 1px; padding-top: 297px; margin-left: 608px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font:
非对称加密
私钥对数据签名，公钥验证

switch.text: 非对称加密私钥对数据签名，公钥验证...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 231px; height: 1px; padding-top: 387px; margin-left: 608px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.span:
PoW，对关键数据不停地计算，
直到结果满足某些条件

switch.text: 工作量证明PoW，对关键数据不停地计算，...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 231px; height: 1px; padding-top: 477px; margin-left: 608px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.span: 可花费输出，用于转账时花费，成为新的转账的输入，并通过此输入转化成其他新的UTXO

switch.text: 未花费输出可花费输出，用于转账时花费，成为新的转账的输入，并通过此输入转化成其他新的UTXO...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 231px; height: 1px; padding-top: 567px; margin-left: 608px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.span: 一个区块包含N个交易，一笔交易包含1到2笔转账

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 190px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.span: 将N个字节进行特殊运算，其结果有32个字节（256 bit），不可逆推

p.font: 将每一个block的prev hash 设置成另一个区块的hash 使他们形成链条关系，数据结构为hash 链表

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
